about.details:
Incorporated in 2017, Sunrest Lifescience Limited offers a diverse range of healthcare and personal care products.

The company's product range includes Capsules, Tablets, Syrup, Ointment, Gel, mouthwash, Solution, Suspension, Dry Powders, and Toothpaste. Sunrest Lifescience's product portfolio encompasses an extensive range of drugs such as Anti-Bacterial, Anti Diarrheal, AntiFungal, Anti Malerial, Anti Diabetic, Dental Cure, Anti Protozol, Anti Histamine, Anti-Hypertensive drugs, Cosmetic, Anti Parasitic, Multivitamin, Multimineral, Nutraceutical, and Anti-inflammatory.

The company gets its products manufactured by third-party pharma product manufacturers which also includes Trilend Pharmaceuticals Private Limited (Trilend), a Sunrest group company. The company has 43 third-party manufacturers across these states: Gujarat, Punjab, Maharashtra, Haryana, Himachal Pradesh, Uttarakhand and Madhya Pradesh.

Sunrest Lifescience's clientele includes stockists and Super Stockists & in turn, it is available at Chemist shops, Dispensaries, Hospitals, etc.

With 18 Registered Trademarks for 32 products, Sunrest Lifescience is committed to delivering high-quality products to its customers.

faqs.question: What is the Sunrest Lifescience IPO?
faqs.answer:
Sunrest Lifescience IPO is a SME IPO of 1291200 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹10.85 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹84 per share. The minimum order quantity is 1600.

The IPO opens on November 7, 2023, and closes on November 9, 2023.

Skyline Financial Services Private Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on NSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Sunrest Lifescience IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Sunrest Lifescience IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Sunrest Lifescience IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Sunrest Lifescience IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Sunrest Lifescience IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Sunrest Lifescience IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Sunrest Lifescience IPO opens on November 7, 2023 and closes on November 9, 2023.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Sunrest Lifescience IPO?
faqs.answer: Sunrest Lifescience IPO lot size is 1600, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,34,400.

faqs.question: How to apply for Sunrest Lifescience IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Sunrest Lifescience IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Sunrest Lifescience IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Sunrest Lifescience IPO will be done on Wednesday, November 15, 2023, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Friday, November 17, 2023. Check the Sunrest Lifescience IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Sunrest Lifescience IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Sunrest Lifescience IPO listing date is on Monday, November 20, 2023.
